text: The 1927 Tour de Hongrie was the third edition of the Tour de Hongrie cycle race and was held from 12 to 15 August 1927. The race started and finished in Budapest. The race was won by László Vida. ==Route== {| class="wikitable" |+ Stages of the 1927 Tour de Hongrie |- ! scope="col" | Stage ! scope="col" | Date ! scope="col" | Route ! scope="col" | Distance ! scope="col" | Winner |- ! scope="col" | 1 | style="text-align:right;" | 12 August | Budapest to Pécs | | |- ! scope="col" | 2 | style="text-align:right;" | 13 August | Pécs to Nagykanizsa | | |- ! scope="col" | 3 | style="text-align:right;" | 14 August | Nagykanizsa to Pápa | |- ! scope="col" | 4 | style="text-align:right;" | 15 August | Pápa to Budapest | | |- | colspan="3" style="text-align:center" | Total | colspan="2" style="text-align:center" | '''''' |} ==General classification== {| |Final general classification {| class="wikitable" |- ! scope="col" | Rank ! scope="col" | Rider ! scope="col" | Team ! scope="col" | Time |- | style="text-align:center;" | 1 | | BSE | style="text-align:right;" | |- | style="text-align:center;" | 2 | | Világosság KK | style="text- align:right;" | + 19' 03" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 3 | | Postás | style="text-align:right;" | + 28' 07" |} |} ==References== 1927 Tour de Hongrie Tour de Hongrie
